DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effectiveness Vacuum Assisted Closure® ( V.A.C.® ) Therapy moist wound therapy amputation wound diabetic foot . The primary objective determine effect V.A.C.® Therapy incidence complete wound closure . Secondary objective include evaluate acceleration wound closure , facilitation surgical closure , incidence foot salvage , incidence wound complication .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Vacuum Assisted Closure® Therapy Amputation Wounds Diabetic Foot
